name: پلاگین همکاری در فروش لایسنس نود
author: روح الله طالبیان

sections.description:
By using this plugin you can easily sell Node 32 home licenses,
without needing Payment Gateway or even needing design.

You must just install the plugin and enter your specific code in it.
by using short code and putting it in a page, start selling license.

this plugin is usable for only Iranian for now.

for more information please look out at : www.taknod.com

با استفاده از این پلاگین بدون داشتن درگاه پرداخت اقدام به فروش لایسنس نود کنید
در این فرایند شما نیاز به درگاه پرداخت یا سرمایگذاری نداارید

برای اطلاعات بیشتر به سایت taknod.com مراجعه کنید
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Login to www.taknod.com/eset
  4. By using shortcode and your api key from taknod.com setup your sell page
sections.faq:
how i get my api key ?

simple! just register at taknod.com/eset and get your api key.

How i manage my selling information ?

from your user panel at taknod.com/eset
